scripts.dist:copy:firefox: rsync -av --exclude '.git' --exclude 'node_modules' --exclude 'logs' --exclude '*.map' --exclude 'native-host' --exclude '*.entry.*' icons pages src manifest-firefox.json package.json package-lock.json dist/firefox/run-in-terminal/ && mv dist/firefox/run-in-terminal/manifest-firefox.json dist/firefox/run-in-terminal/manifest.json
scripts.dist:copy:chrome: rsync -av --exclude '.git' --exclude 'node_modules' --exclude 'logs' --exclude '*.map' --exclude 'native-host' --exclude '*.entry.*' icons pages src manifest-chrome.json package.json package-lock.json dist/chrome/run-in-terminal/ && mv dist/chrome/run-in-terminal/manifest-chrome.json dist/chrome/run-in-terminal/manifest.json
scripts.release:firefox: npm run dist:clean:firefox && npm run build && npm run dist:copy:firefox && npm run pack:firefox
scripts.release:chrome: npm run dist:clean:chrome && npm run build && npm run dist:copy:chrome && npm run pack:chrome
scripts.sign:firefox: web-ext sign -s dist/run-in-terminal -a dist/signed --id run-in-terminal@tada.com --channel listed --api-key $AMO_JWT_ISSUER --api-secret $AMO_JWT_SECRET
